reviews.title: No schedule
reviews.comment: So the only reason I wanted this app doesn\'t work. The schedule tells you to install the app... after launching it from the app. Completely broken only works for the map of the floor.
reviews.author: Scott Gresham

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: Not useful. Can\'t scroll or pick and stay on a particular day or just programs. Only see 1st 5 things for Wednesday, over and ocer. Uninstall
reviews.author: Michelle Lathe

reviews.title: App sucks
reviews.comment: This just runs the schedule as embedded mobile Web (which does not work very well with this many people using cell phones). Why doesn\'t the separate MySched work anymore? Why does the website only load mobile when chrome requests full desktop site? Are Android users second class citizens?
reviews.author: Timothy Brown

reviews.title: Gone back to the paper schedule.
reviews.comment: So disappointed with this app.   1 star for having info available but I was constantly having to refresh the app as it would stop loading the daily schedule part way through. And then I would have to scroll from the top.   And I can either view by day OR Catagory (ie Panels) but not both.
reviews.author: Loren Kling

reviews.title: This is not an app
reviews.comment: What a horrible attempt at creating an android app. This is not even an app. Looks like something created in a matter of hours, it\'s just a web browser that connects to the comic con mobile site.why do  iOS users get the full native app?
reviews.author: Francisco Paredes

reviews.title: Lazy. Web access only.  No offline support.
reviews.comment: #SDCC Do not hire this company to do your android application next year!
reviews.author: Adam Rickey

reviews.title: this app blows
reviews.comment: Just like others say...only reason I wanted app was for schedule. Doesnt work. Waste my time! Dont waste yours! Ugh
reviews.author: Karen Livingston

reviews.title: Don\'t bother downloading
reviews.comment: No point using an app that just gives you a link to their website. Last year\'s app was much better.
reviews.author: Christine Tung

reviews.title: Worst app ever
reviews.comment: This app doesn\'t actually do anything aside from linking you to the CC website mobile version   The mobile version of the CC website is buggy as hell and doesn\'t even let me scroll through the programming properly.  The app used to be somewhat functional but now it has been nerfed to the point of being completely useless.  It is a pile of steaming failure heaped inside a desperation bowl.
reviews.author: Angel Salazar

reviews.title: Does not work without data
reviews.comment: A lot of people have connectivity issues at the convention center. it would have been nice to store the information locally to your phone. this just links you to the website. without data it is useless.
reviews.author: Yung Min

reviews.title: What Even...
reviews.comment: This app as useless for me. It was just a wrapper for the mobile version of the site, which I was able to access easier using an actual browser. Everything in this app worked slower than just pulling up the info on a browser or even, as for the maps, downloading and opening the PDF. I hope next year\'s app is actually functional. 0 stars.
reviews.author: Nicole Hill

reviews.title: Unresponsive
reviews.comment: The previous version was buggy enough, now with it being online-only it\'s so unresponsive when in areas of high bandwidth usage that it\'s unusable...
reviews.author: Chris English

reviews.title: Waste
reviews.comment: What\'s a waste of space. How hard is.it to make the same app as apple. Who ever is working on this should get fired. Its 2013 and Comic-con is going on right now. This app should be ready to go by now
reviews.author: joshua solorzano

reviews.title: Massively Improved -- It ROCKS Now!!
reviews.comment: UPDATE 2013:  This app is now GREAT!!  The prior version was tragic and got a major rebuild/facelift.  I used the app several times a day at SDCC and it never let me down. This app is now essentially the equal of the paper guide, minus the ability to dogear pages.  It now needs to let me sign in and show the schedule I created on the web site, with 1st, 2nd & 3rd choices per time block.  Or let me create one on this app.  Get this app and use it for 2014!!
reviews.author: Kevin Donnelly

reviews.title: Literally the worst app I\'ve ever seen
reviews.comment: When you go to \"Programs\" it loads a page that says \"Download our app on Google Play or continue to site\"...I didn\'t have anything to do with this app and I am embarrassed on behalf of it. The iPhone app looks pretty decent from the screen caps on iTunes, how can WELL over half of the attendees be disregarded this blatantly? Comic-Con should be ashamed of itself. For various reasons, this just being one of the many. Don\'t even waste time with this thing unless they update it with something that took more than 25 seconds to slap together so they can at least say they have SOMETHING on Android.
reviews.author: Evan Harrison

reviews.title: Simply embarrassing
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe how unintuitive this app is. I\'m insulted by how poorly this was realized - with an app this bad, why bother? It\'s terrible to begin with, but suffers even more compared to the iOS version. If you\'re going to build an Android app, do it properly - don\'t patronize us with this lazy garbage.
reviews.author: Cristina Rosales

reviews.title: I\'d give it a 0 if I could
reviews.comment: This is terrible. Doesn\'t even show any of the schedules. Just a link to download the app or go to the mobile site. Don\'t bother downloading.
reviews.author: Jeremy Willner

reviews.title: Why did they bother?
reviews.comment: It is basically a shell for the mobile site. You can\'t log on to show your schedule. I hope CC didn\'t pay these people for building this app.
reviews.author: Keven Jeffery

reviews.title: Don\'t believe in what the other people are saying about this app.
reviews.comment: All of these one and two stars were reviewed before the update. The app works just fine since they updated all the bugs. Its nice because you have the floor plan, so once you get there you know where to go from the start. Although it still has the floor plan from a few weeks ago. Due to it just ending. It also has the local hotels and shuttles nearby, so you can plan your stay early. This is a must app for anybody who loves to go to comic-con and wants to see where everything is ahead of time
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unusable
reviews.comment: Clicked the programs link from inside the app, redirects me to mobile site which says to download the app.
reviews.author: cody garcia
